Functional description: Wza - Periplasmic protein involved in polysaccharide export
Transmembrane exosortase; recognize and cleave the carboxyl-terminal sorting signal PEP-CTERM on surface proteins from outer membrane
Catalyzes the two-step NADP-dependent conversion of GDP- 4-dehydro-6-deoxy-D-mannose to GDP-fucose
Catalyzes the conversion of GDP-D-mannose to GDP-4- dehydro-6-deoxy-D-mannose
Belongs to the UDP-glucose GDP-mannose dehydrogenase family
LICD Family phosphorylcholine transferase; may be involved in the modification of glycan moieties of alpha-dystroglycan
Catalyzes the 2'-O-methylation of the ribose of cytidine
Belongs to the membrane fusion protein (MFP) (TC 8.A.1) family
ATPase that binds to both the 70S ribosome and the 50S ribosomal subunit in a nucleotide-independent manner
calcium- and calmodulin-responsive adenylate cyclase activity
surface antigen, filamentous hemagglutinin family N-terminal domain
